title: Soba-Edamame Noodle Bowl
directions: Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil. Add edamame and soba noodles; cook 2 minutes. Add snow peas; cook 1 minute or until noodles are tender. Drain; rinse noodle mixture well with cold water. Drain.
Combine oil and next 6 ingredients (through salt) in a large bowl. Add noodle mixture, cabbage, onions, and carrots; toss gently to combine. Sprinkle with cilantro, if desired.
ingredients: 1 cup thinly vertically sliced snow peas
1 tablespoon lower-sodium soy sauce or tamari
2 cups very thinly sliced red cabbage
2 large carrots, peeled and shaved into ribbons
